name: 4X4 Real Derby Racing
description:
Welcome to a world of TOTAL destruction!

4x4 Real Derby Racing is adrenaline-filled 4WD SUV racing game with damage,realistic physics and beautiful graphics, innovative game play mechanics and good fun!
Crash your opponents to earn a money and buy new SUVs!

Advise fasten your sit belts and smash all enemies to win!

Features:
- Car racing game with damage effect
- Highly 4WD SUV
- AI smart technology
- Real car's physics
- Beautiful graphics
- Designed for a good display on devices with low and high resolutions (including tablets)

Like us at Facebook and stay tuned with all new games and updates
https://www.facebook.com/smartmovegames

Vkontakte http://vk.com/smartmovegames

Music by Beetmaker Teejay
